title: What are the main differences we should care about in 2020, iPhone 11 or iPhone 11 Pro? - Quora

response.answer_text: The iPhone 11 Pro has a 5.8-inch OLED screen, while the 11 has a 6.1-inch LCD display. ... On paper that means the iPhone 11 Pro is capable of darker black levels and more color saturation. That said, side-by-side, the differences between the two screens are sometimes hard to notice

NO matter you go for which iPhone model in the market, they're all running same software and deliver you the same software experience .what you should be considering is the HARDWARE, which config of hardware you need for your daily driver.
